scripts.build-microsoft: cargo build --release && cargo-cp-artifact -a cdylib profile-microsoft  microsoft.fontspectorplugin -- cargo build -p profile-microsoft  --message-format=json-render-diagnostics --release
scripts.build-test: cargo build --release && cargo-cp-artifact -a cdylib profile-testplugin  testplugin.fontspectorplugin -- cargo build -p profile-testplugin  --message-format=json-render-diagnostics --release
